quotes.quote: It's important to have girlfriends, because guys tend to come and go.
Whether you're throwing up or breaking up, you want your girlfriend right there! I don't trust women who don't go to their girlfriends.
I mean everybody's got ex-boyfriends and girlfriends. Everybody's got baggage.
Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
True friends are like diamonds bright, beautiful, valuable and always in style.

Girls get competitive, as though there's only one spot in the world for everything   but that's not true. We need to stick together and see there's more to life than pleasing men. It's important not to cut yourself off from female friendships. I think sometimes girls get scared of other girls, but you need each other.
When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
Love doesn't make the world go 'round; love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
We like the wrong sorts of girls, they wrote. They are usually the ones worth writing about.
The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
The greatest sweetener of human life is friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.
Friendship is the inexpressible comfort of feeling safe with a person, having neither to weigh thoughts nor measure words.
Grow old along with me, the best is yet to be.
I have said nothing because there is nothing I can say that would describe how I feel as perfectly as you deserve it.
As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change. . . I will always keep falling in love with you.
One relationship ends but life goes on. Your  Ex' was just a stepping stone to something better.
I thought I still loved you but then I realized I just love the memories of who you used to be.
You're no longer a part of my life, but I wish you the best with yours.
When your girlfriend breaks your heart, don't say a word, just smile because she gives you the opportunity to find someone better than her.
No relationship is perfect nor will anyone ever be the best boyfriend or girlfriend. Long as you put in the effort and try to make your lover happy. That's all we can ask for.
A good girl gives you happiness and a bad girl gives you experience both are essential in life so enjoy every girlfriend!
Music is like girlfriends to me; I'm continually astonished by the choices other people make.

A Code of Honor: Never approach a friend's girlfriend or wife with mischief as your goal. There are just too many women in the world to justify that sort of dishonorable behavior. Unless she's really attractive.
I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.
I could have a million chances to fall in love again. I never can fall in love with anyone the way I fell for you!
If you would stop looking in the mirror and only look at yourself the way I look at you, you would know that you are not only precious but also the most beautiful person ever.
If you want know how special you are to me, remember that you are not my number one. You are my only one and I will never ever let you down.
But to see her was to love her, Love but her, and love forever.
And here is my heart which beats only for you.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength; loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Half the motorists can't drive fast enough to please their girlfriends, while the other half can't drive slow enough to appease their wives.
A wife is a great consolation, especially when a man comes home after his girl friend has run out on him.
A penny saved is a girlfriend lost.
The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend.
I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend.
You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.
A girlfriend once told me never to fight with anybody you don't love.

I fantasize about going back to high school with the knowledge I have now. I would shine. I would have a good time, I would have a girlfriend. I think that's where a lot of my pain comes from. I think I never had any teenage years to go back to.
I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.
Women are in control. This is the biggest thing you will ever learn. In dating, women are totally in control.
Women are your friends; they're your buddies. You've just got to learn about them and learn hot to work them. There are no real dating techniques.

Once you learn about women, you can start pushing their buttons--in a good way. Women love for men to pay attention to them. But there has to be something special about that man who's giving the attention.

Enchantment of eyes of one of the opposite sex may be the beginning of a love. Whether intentional or not, eyes gaze from a man to a woman, or from a woman to a man, can turn into love and then become love.

Whether or not you are in a relationship, or just have girlfriend who you hang out with, know that there will always be a place in life where you will have to learn how to accept someone else's differences.
A girlfriend is an individual that's focused on her life which is why many girlfriends may be vaguely annoying asnd may be somewhat needy.
Girls want strong men who are self-sufficient...not 'loveable losers' needing women to be happy and complete.
Being in a relationship is about being selfless. You'll stop thinking about yourself and learn about empathizing with others, especially your girlfriend.
Having a girlfriend that complements you, will make you both a powerhouse unstoppable team together helping each other get ahead in live and synergistically achieve greatness.
Having a girlfriend can be both a love-and-hate relationship in itself...with your own self.

Having a girlfriend means you'll going to have more maintenance on your hand to keep the relationship going. If you're the overly ambitious-type trying to make a success out of yourself, you are going to have to sacrifice some time into your girlfriend.

If you call a girl once and she doesn't return your call, it's possible that she never got the message. However, if you call a girl fifty-one times and she still hasn't called you back, it's you who hasn't gotten the message.
Prom night was one of the worst night of my life. My girlfriend looked fantastic. The problem was, so did her date.
As my success has grown, I've really learned who my true friends are.
Our closest girlfriends will remain constant, ready to tell us, whenever we need to hear it, that we're strong and good and equal to each new challenge.
I've always had only a  few close girlfriends, and we think of each other as sisters in the truest sense.
When I have a problem, my best friend doesn't tell me what to do. She just says things that help me make the right decisions.
You know everything about the other. You are comfortable. There are no secrets.
Wise are those who don’t have a Girlfriend / They are free to enjoy with their friends / I feel happy to think that I don’t have a Girlfriend / O God, shield me against this trend
Girlfriend causes two friends to fight / Just for the show of might / One should avoid having a girlfriend / If one wants to avoid fighting with a friend
All I need in this life of sin / Is me and my girlfriend / Down to ride till the happy end / Is me and my girlfriend
All I'm saying is that you shouldn't stay with him for the wrong reasons, even if they are noble ones. No one owes it to someone else to be their girlfriend. It's a choice you remake every day.
A relationship is likely to last way longer, if each partner convinces or has convinced themselves that they do not deserve their partner, even if that is not true.
In innumerable cases, the woman fell in love, not with the man, but with the lifestyle that came with being his girlfriend, wife, or mistress.
Many a man once started a friendship with a woman just to get into her life, with the sole intention of making her his girlfriend as soon as he could.
